name: Adverse Impact Likelihood
description: Likelihood of threat event resulting in adverse impacts

values.name: Very Low
values.description: If the threat event is initiated or occurs, it is highly unlikely to have adverse impacts.

values.name: Low
values.description: If the threat event is initiated or occurs, it is unlikely to have adverse impacts.

values.name: Moderate
values.description: If the threat event is initiated or occurs, it is somewhat likely to have adverse impacts.

values.name: High
values.description: If the threat event is initiated or occurs, it is highly likely to have adverse impacts.

values.name: Very High
values.description: If the threat event is initiated or occurs, it is almost certain to have adverse impacts.
